game_join_error_alreadyJoined: Don't worry, you are already in the game :wink:

wake_up_description: Good morning! But is the morning actually good?.. It's time to share your suspicions :scales:
sleep_time_description: Hope everyone makes it to the morning!
kills_title: The rising sun illuminated the traces of horrible atrocities
no_kills_description: Nobody was killed last night! Perhaps you should thank the doctor? 😯
role_vote_select_placeHolder: Select who you want to vote against...
role_peaceful_description:
%Your goal is to save the city from criminals!
:scales:  Reveal the identities of the villains and achieve their ban from the city.
:trophy:  The innocents win if there are no murderers left in the city. :exclamation: Be careful: if the mafia is at least half of all active players, they take over the city and win!%
role_mafia_description:
%KILL AND SURVIVE!
:skull_crossbones:  Every night the mafia kills one player for whom its members give the most votes (in case of a tie the player is chosen at random). But remember: the victim may be cured by the doctor.
:trophy:  The mafia wins if it is at least half of all active players.% + ({r:maniac:count} > 0 ? % Exception: if there are two players left — a mafia member and the maniac — the maniac wins.% : %%) + ({r:mafia:count} > 1 ? %
:busts_in_silhouette:  Your teammates: % + %{oPlayersTRole}% : %%)
role_killer_description:
%KILL EVERYONE AND SURVIVE!
:axe:  Once every two nights you kill any player you want. But remember: the victim may be cured by the doctor.
:trophy:  You win if no more than one player besides you remains in the city. Spare nobody!%
role_doctor_placeHolder: Select who you want to heal...
role_doctor_description:
%You save people's lives! :heart:
:pill:  Every night you heal one player. If this player is chosen by the criminals, he or she will stay alive.
:trophy:  You win with the innocents if there are no murderers left in the city. :exclamation: Be careful: if the mafia is at least half of all active players, they take over the city and win!%
role_police_placeHolder: Select who you want to check...
role_police_description:
%You investigate crimes in the city! :oncoming_police_car:
:mag_right:  Every night you check one player and find out if he or she belongs to the mafia.
:trophy:  You win with the innocents if there are no murderers left in the city. :exclamation: Be careful: if the mafia is at least half of all active players, they take over the city and win!%
role_mistress_placeHolder: Select who you want to visit...
role_mistress_description:
%You bring love to this world! And what is love — who knows... :kiss:
:strawberry:  Every night you visit one of the players. The next day, this player can't be voted out.
:trophy:  You win with the innocents if there are no murderers left in the city. :exclamation: Be careful: if the mafia is at least half of all active players, they take over the city and win!%
condition_mafiaWin_WinEmbedDescription:
%The mafia has taken over the city — the law is defeated.
The mafia members: {sr:mafia:string}.%
condition_killerWin_WinEmbedDescription: %The maniac {sr:killer:string} has won — the whole city is cut out.%
condition_peacefulWin_WinEmbedDescriptio:
%The innocents have won — there are no criminals left in the city.
The murderers were: {sa:kill:string}.%
premium_description:
:zap: Create **custom roles** with unique features, such as action, game style, description and thumbnail!
:dizzy: Create **custom end game conditions** to describe gaming with your roles or to change the default!
:fire: Create **custom games** with your roles and conditions and **impress your friends**!
:sparkling_heart: **Support us** in improving Mafia bot, adding new features and a lot more!
Subscribe for just `$1/month`
premium_howDoIGet_value:
1. Join the official Mafia server: https://discord.gg/ZWnx8rqGTD
2. Join Mafia Bot Premium on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/MafiaBot775
3. Link your Discord account to Patreon.
4. Wait a bit and enjoy :3
premium_faq_value:
:small_orange_diamond: What should I do if I didn't get Premium after subscribing?
:small_blue_diamond: Just send a direct message to one of our developers or *message to support* with a dedicated button in the help.
:small_orange_diamond: How do I link my Discord account to Patreon?
:small_blue_diamond: See a Patreon article: https://support.patreon.com/hc/en-us/articles/212052266-Getting-Discord-access
:small_orange_diamond: How do I cancel the subscription and what happens then?
:small_blue_diamond: See a Patreon article: https://support.patreon.com/hc/en-us/articles/360005502572-How-do-I-cancel-
After cancelling the subscription you will be able to continue enjoying all Premium benefits until the end of the paid period. After that you will no longer be able to create, edit and use custom roles and conditions, but your already created roles and conditions will be preserved. You will be able to restore the subscription and continue using them at any time.

news_error_noAccess_enabled:
:man_gesturing_no: You can't turn on or off news notifications for another person, but you can for yourself!
:mailbox: You have news notifications enabled. To disable them, open your profile with the </profile:1100344392067338261> command and click the "**News notifications**" button.
news_error_noAccess_disabled:
:man_gesturing_no: You can't turn on or off news notifications for another person, but you can for yourself!
:mailbox_closed: You have news notifications disabled. To enable them, open your profile with the </profile:1100344392067338261> command and click the "**News notifications**" button.
help_description:
Do you want to play Mafia without extra difficulties? We are here to help you!
**Mafia Bot** allows you to organize games that are perfect for you, as well as create, edit and use your own roles and end game conditions with Premium. Have a good time!
help_commands_value:
</create:1015716817945247794> — create a new game
</lang:1044351625621405797> — change the bot language
</profile:1100344392067338261> — view your profile
</help:1100344392067338262> — you are here ^_^
help_faq_value:
:small_orange_diamond: Can I play for free?
:small_blue_diamond: Yes, you can join any games and create ones with default roles and end conditions for free. Premium allows you to create, edit and use custom roles and conditions.
:small_orange_diamond: Who can I play with?
:small_blue_diamond: Only users on the server with access to the channel where the game is created can join it.
:small_orange_diamond: What should I do if something goes wrong?
:small_blue_diamond: Please end the game and create a new one. Also please _message to support_ about what happened with the button below.
:small_orange_diamond: Are all the players required to have Premium to play with custom stuff?
:small_blue_diamond: No, only the host needs Premium.
help_plans_value: We plan to empower game hosts, extend the user profile, add more actions for roles, custom game stages, new localizations and a lot more!
help_about_value:
`Version:` 2.0.0

`Localization:` denyshon#9143 (`uk`, `ru`), Boy From God#2772 (`fu`)
`Arts:` Midjourney, popa_sani#4041
